body_html: @Yangqing do you guys happen to have example WORKSPACE and BUILD files for using TensorFlow in an Android app that is separately managed (i.e. the Android project is not located inside the TensorFlow project like your example is)? bazel has a huge learning curve to incorporate a large dependency like TensorFlow and I'm not crazy about manually copying over the .h and .so files.
